What is the official name of Jakarta?	Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta
What is the official name of Jakarta?	Daerah Khusus.
How is the climate in the city?	Jakarta has a hot and humid equatorial/tropical climate 
How is the climate in the city?	The city is hot and humid.
Where does the name of the city Jakarta come from?	The name Jakarta is derived from the Sanskrit word "Jayakarta."
How is the city's governor chosen?	election
How is the city's governor chosen?	Through election.
Why does Jakarta suffer frequent flooding?	Because it is located approximately eight meters above the sea level
Why does Jakarta suffer frequent flooding?	The fact that the northern part of Jakarta lies on a plain, approximately eight meters above the sea level.

Who began control of migration to the city in order to stem the overcrowding and poverty?	Lieutenant General Ali Sadikin began control of migration to the city in order to stem the overcrowding and poverty.
